definitions.definition: An industrial region in eastern Ukraine .
The two Russian separatist enclaves, the Donetsk People’s Republic and the Luhansk People’s Republic .

main_definition: ( usually with definite article ) An industrial region in eastern Ukraine .
secondary_definitions: ( colloquial , without definite article ) The two Russian separatist enclaves, the Donetsk People’s Republic and the Luhansk People’s Republic .
